name: 1 Life 2 Die
description:
Description:

This is my first game made for my first game jam (GameDev.tv Game Jam 2022).

This project allow me to learn a lot of things.

To progress in the level and go to the exit, you must die.

Controls:

Move : Arrow key / WASD

Jump : Space

Pause menu : Escape

Credits:

Assets : https://www.kenney.nl/

Font : "Catamaran" designed by Pria Ravichandran
